contents.text: Welcome to Voiceops in San Francisco, your source for coachable insights to improve your sales conversations.
For sales and product information, press 1.
For a product demo or to schedule a trial, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our demo team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a quick product demo to evaluate features for my team
I’m an ex-military veteran running a small consulting firm; I’d like to schedule a demo of your call coaching platform.
Schedule a hands-on demo of the VoiceOps call-coaching platform with API integration details.
I’d like to arrange a walkthrough of the software so I can try it out.
Schedule a demo to evaluate VoiceOps for analyzing my study group discussions

contents.text: To speak with a sales representative, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Discuss pricing and package options with a sales representative
As a veteran entrepreneur, I need to speak with a sales rep about pricing options and potential veteran discounts.
Connect with a sales representative to discuss enterprise licensing and volume pricing options.
I need to speak with someone about purchasing and pricing details.
Speak with a sales representative to ask about student or academic pricing options

contents.text: For technical support and billing inquiries, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot an urgent technical issue with the platform
I’m having trouble accessing my call analytics dashboard and need technical support to troubleshoot.
Get technical support to troubleshoot the 503 error on my VoiceOps webhook integration.
I’m experiencing an issue with the software and need help troubleshooting.
Troubleshoot an error preventing my call recordings from uploading

contents.text: For billing and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Update our account’s billing information and payment method
I have a billing question—I need to review my latest invoice and update my payment method.
Review and update my subscription billing details, and clarify charges for the premium analytics module.
I have a question about my invoice and need assistance with my bill.
Request a refund or clarification on a trial subscription charge
